con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="distrelec"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="f_run b2b"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:config.script: testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.printContext()
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.clearContext()
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#out_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("go to home").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit credentials").httpRequest ) return

def jsessionid = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getCookieFromHttpRequest( testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit credentials").httpRequest, "jsessionid" )
testRunner.testCase.properties["in_jsessionid"].value = jsessionid assert(jsessionid == testRunner.testCase.properties["in_jsessionid"].value) return true

testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit category navigation, step1").httpRequest ) return

testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit category navigation, step2").httpRequest ) return
return testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getRandomL2CategoryId(testRunner)
return testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getRandomLnCategoryId(testRunner)
return testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getRandomSearchTerm(testRunner)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit search").httpRequest ) return
return testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getRandomProductId(testRunner)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit product, step1").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit product, step2").httpRequest ) return

con:testCase.name: f_add product to compare view and compare

con:testStep.name: get product ids and save to context

con:parameter.con:name: productCodes[]
con:parameter.con:value: ${get product ids and save to context#result}

con:config.script: testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit add product").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("compare").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit remove product").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit change name").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit change newsletter").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit show card").httpRequest ) return
return testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getRandomProductId(testRunner)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit product add cart").httpRequest ) return

testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit remove product from cart").httpRequest ) return
return testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getRandomProductId(testRunner)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit product add cart").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit save cart to csv").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit save cart to xls").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("follow redirect").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("follow redirect").httpRequest ) return
def rand = new Random() return Math.abs(rand.nextLong())
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit create shopping list").httpRequest ) return

con:testStep.name: get shopping list id from redirect location

con:config.script: testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit remove shopping list").httpRequest ) return
return testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getRandomProductId(testRunner)

con:testStep.name: submit add product to shopping list

con:config.script: testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit add product to shopping list").httpRequest ) return

testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit availability of product").httpRequest ) return

def response = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["submit /checkout/address"].httpRequest.response.responseContent return response!= null ? testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getQuotedText(response, "name=\"billingAddressId\" value=\"") : "8826503594007"

def response = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["submit /checkout/address"].httpRequest.response.responseContent
return response != null ? testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getQuotedText(response, "name=\"shippingAddressId\" value=\"") : "8826503594007"
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit continue checkout1").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit /checkout/detail").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit change shipment").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit change payment").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit /checkout/review").httpRequest ) return

testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit/checkout/review/addNote").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit continue checkout2").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit/checkout/payment").testRequest ) return

testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("follow redirect to payment summary").httpRequest ) return

testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("follow redirect to payment summary1").httpRequest ) return
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.logRequestTimes( context, context.expand('${#TestCase#in_jsessionid}'), testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("submit order manager").httpRequest ) return
return testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers.getRandomProductId(testRunner)

def langs = []
def country = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["get country"].properties["result"].value switch(country) { case "DE": langs.add("de") break
case "CH": langs.add("de") langs.add("fr") break
case "AT": langs.add("de") break
case "IT": langs.add("it")
case "LT": langs.add("lt")
case "SE": langs.add("se")
case "DK": langs.add("dk")
case "NO": langs.add("no")
default: return langs.add("en") }
langs.add("en")
def rand = new Random() return langs[rand.nextInt(langs.size())]

def currs = []
def country = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["get country"].properties["result"].value switch(country) { case "DE": currs.add("EUR") break
case "CH": currs.add("CHF") break
case "AT": currs.add("EUR") break
case "IT": currs.add("EUR") break
case "LT": currs.add("LTL") break
case "SE": currs.add("SEK") break
case "DK": currs.add("DKK") break
case "NO": currs.add("NOK") break
case "NL": currs.add("EUR") break
default: return currs.add("EUR") }
def rand = new Random() return currs[rand.nextInt(currs.size())]

def helpers = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute login", null).run(testRunner, context)

helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute text search", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to compare view and compare", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove product from compare view", null) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute product detail", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute import tool upload via textfield", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to favorite list", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove product from favorite list", null) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show favorite list", null)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute create shopping list", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to shopping list", null )).run(testRunner, context)
*/ helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show shopping list", null).run(testRunner, context)
/* helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove shopping list", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to cart", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove product from cart", null) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show cart", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute direct order", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute save cart to xls", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute save cart to csv", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute checkout", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show order manager", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute static support", null).run(testRunner, context)

helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show order manager", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute checkout", null) ).run(testRunner, context)

con:testStep.name: execute add product to compare view and compare
execute remove product from compare view
execute add product to shopping list
execute add product to favorite list
execute remove product from favorite list
execute import tool upload via textfield

con:config.script:
def langs = []
def country = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["get country"].properties["result"].value log.info(country) switch(country) { case "DE": langs.add("de") break
case "CH": langs.add("de") langs.add("fr") break
case "AT": langs.add("de") break
case "IT": langs.add("it")
case "LT": langs.add("lt")
case "SE": langs.add("se")
case "DK": langs.add("dk")
case "NO": langs.add("no")
default: return langs.add("en") }
langs.add("en")
def rand = new Random() return langs[rand.nextInt(langs.size())]

def currs = []
def country = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["get country"].properties["result"].value switch(country) { case "DE": currs.add("EUR") break
case "CH": currs.add("CHF") break
case "AT": currs.add("EUR") break
case "IT": currs.add("EUR") break
case "LT": currs.add("LTL") break
case "SE": currs.add("SEK") break
case "DK": currs.add("DKK") break
case "NO": currs.add("NOK") break
case "NL": currs.add("EUR") break
default: return currs.add("EUR") }
def rand = new Random() return currs[rand.nextInt(currs.size())]

def helpers = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute category navigation level 1", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute category navigation level 2", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute category navigation level n", null) ) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute text search", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to compare view and compare", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove product from compare view", null) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute product detail", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute import tool upload via textfield", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to favorite list", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove product from favorite list", null) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show favorite list", null)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute create shopping list", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to shopping list", null )).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show shopping list", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove shopping list", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to cart", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove product from cart", null) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show cart", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute direct order", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute save cart to xls", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute save cart to csv", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute checkout", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show order manager", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute static support", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute account detail change newsletter", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute logout", null).run(testRunner, context) return

con:testStep.name: execute add product to compare view and compare
execute remove product from compare view
execute add product to shopping list
execute add product to favorite list
execute remove product from favorite list
execute import tool upload via textfield

con:config.script: def endpoint = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["get endpoint"].properties["result"].value return "https://" + endpoint
def endpoint = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["get endpoint"].properties["result"].value return "http://" + endpoint

def langs = []
def country = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["get country"].properties["result"].value switch(country) { case "DE": langs.add("de") langs.add("en") break
case "CH": langs.add("de") langs.add("en") langs.add("fr") break
case "AT": langs.add("de") langs.add("en") break
default: return langs.add("de") }
def rand = new Random() return langs[rand.nextInt(langs.size())]

def currs = []
def country = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["get country"].properties["result"].value switch(country) { case "DE": currs.add("EUR") break
case "CH": currs.add("CHF") break
case "AT": currs.add("EUR") break
default: return currs.add("EUR") }
def rand = new Random() return currs[rand.nextInt(currs.size())]

def helpers = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.helpers
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute category navigation level 1", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute category navigation level 2", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute category navigation level n", null) ) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute text search", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to compare view and compare", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove product from compare view", null) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute product detail", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute add product to cart", helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove product from cart", null) ).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute show cart", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute direct order", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute save cart to xls", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute save cart to csv", null).run(testRunner, context)
// direct order put new product into cart, now clean the cart again helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute remove product from cart", null)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute static support", null).run(testRunner, context)
helpers.createScenario(1.0, 1, "execute static faq", null).run(testRunner, context) return

con:testStep.name: execute add product to compare view and compare
execute remove product from compare view
